name: National Geographic: Tucci in Italy
description: Ahead of the 2026 Milano-Cortina Olympics, Stanley Tucci and National Geographic explore the pioneering spirit of Italy‚Äôs industrial heartland, the Lombardy region, where the cuisine and ingredients are defiantly forward-thinking. Stanley Tucci tries vegan food at Autogrill, explores a caviar farm, and makes gnocchi with a family navigating adoption policies. And more!

items.name: Stanley Tucci Explores Lombardy (Full Episode) | Tucci in Italy | National Geographic

sections.Creator's Notes:
Ahead of the 2026 Milano-Cortina Olympics, Stanley Tucci and National Geographic explore the pioneering spirit of Italy‚Äôs industrial heartland, the Lombardy region, where the cuisine and ingredients are defiantly forward-thinking. Stanley Tucci tries vegan food at Autogrill, explores a caviar farm, and makes gnocchi with a family navigating adoption policies. 

Tucci in Italy | S1, E2

items.name: Wander through the Streets of Italy with Stanley Tucci | ASMR & Stunning Scenery | Nat Geo

sections.Creator's Notes:
Experience the magic of Italy with Stanley Tucci. Join the beloved actor as he explores the streets of iconic cities like Rome, Bolzano, Florence, Ariccia, and Merano. Immerse yourself in local Italian markets, engage with the incredible Italian food and regional specialities, and discover the stunning beauty of Italy.

items.name: Stanley Tucci's Favorite Italian Bites, Cow Stomachs, & More! | Tucci in Italy | Nat Geo

sections.Creator's Notes:
Join Stanley Tucci on an unforgettable culinary journey through 5 diverse regions of Italy: Trentino-Alto Adige, Lombardy, Abruzzo, Lazio, and Tuscany. Explore the rich history, unique ingredients, vibrant people, and cherished traditions that shape each region's world-renowned cuisine.

items.name: Journey Through Scenic Italy with Stanley Tucci | ASMR | Tucci in Italy | National Geographic

sections.Creator's Notes:
Join Stanley Tucci on a breathtaking, scenic journey through Italy‚Äôs most stunning and serene locations. From the energy of Rome to the peaceful charm of Tuscany, the snowy peaks of Alpe di Siusi, and the turquoise waters of the Trabocchi Coast‚Äîthis is your front-row seat to the vibrant beauty and quiet, calming magic of Italy experienced through all your senses. I sensi sonno tutto. Bring on the chill vibes.

items.name: Stanley Tucci's Tuscany Trek (Full Episode) | Tucci in Italy | National Geographic

sections.Creator's Notes:
Stanley revels in the culinary artistry of this picturesque region. The spirit of creativity is alive in the birthplace of the Renaissance. In Florence, where he spent a memorable year of his youth, he samples a famous‚Äîyet unexpected‚Äîbreakfast dish. He heads out on the ranch with traditional Tuscan cowboys and experiences a grand outdoor feast in Siena at the world-famous Palio.

Tucci in Italy | S1, E1
